writeToParcel(android.os.Parcel, int).FullName: public void writeToParcel (Parcel dest, int flags)

Returns: the list of geofences to be monitored
getGeofences().Description: Gets the list of geofences to be monitored.

Returns: the triggering behavior at the moment when the geofences are added. Its a bit-wise of @B_com#google#android#gms#location#GeofencingRequest#INITIAL_TRIGGER_ENTER_E@ and @B_com#google#android#gms#location#GeofencingRequest#INITIAL_TRIGGER_EXIT_E@.
getInitialTrigger().Description: Gets the triggering behavior at the moment when the geofences are added.

ClassDesc: Specifies the list of geofences to be monitored and how the geofence notifications should be reported. Refer to @B_com#google#android#gms#location#GeofencingApi#addGeofences_E@ on how to monitor geofences.
